name: [Ctrl] Login
author: [Ctrl]Sync

sections.description:
This Plugin is intended to be used to rebrand WordPress with whatever business name or web developer information you choose.

A few notes about the sections above:

*Changes the login logo to a photo of your choosing.
*Removes the WordPress logo in the corner of the admin page.
*Removes WordPress footer text.
*Disables most of the dashboard widgets.
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Naviate to Settings->[Ctrl] Login to configure the plugin.
  4. Use an uploaded photo from your WordPress media section, copy the full http link and save it in the [Ctrl] Login media link input box then save changes.
sections.faq:
How do I use the plugin?

Install plugin, on Admin panel go to settings -> [Ctrl] Login. Enter the web link copied from the media image on your site you want to use as your login logo.

What size login logo is required?

Logo will be automatically resized to 200px by 100px.

short_description: This plugin changes the login logo for wordpress, removes admin corner logo, removes wordpress footer text, and disables admin widgets on the dashboar …
